short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: VPN99 is the fastest, easiest, and most secure VPN service which protects your online activities and data around the clock.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You won't be surprised to learn that all your activities on the Internet can be tracked. ISPs collect this information and store it for a long time. Hackers can also track your activities. Not to mention Wi-Fi networks, especially public ones, where interception of your private data is so easy. A VPN service is essential to keep your important business information private, to play online games and to avoid geographic restrictions when you watch your favorite Netflix series.
The VPN99 service offers the following top benefits: 

1. Access geographically restricted content
2. Unblock online TV such as Netflix and Hulu
3. Protect sensitive Information
4 .Protect your online identity
5. Bypass your country’s web censorship

New - you can now switch between dark and light mode.
